name: MLBPA Baseball
overview: Crush one outta the yard! Never before has a baseball game been created that captures the details of the sport like MLBPA Baseball. Realistic run-downs accurate cutoff plays, the double switch, multiple defensive alignments, snap throws, even bad hops and booted balls. Throw in every player from Alomar to Zeile and you've got the only baseball game worth playing for the Sega Genesis. - Every player in the big leagues - Huge arcade style graphics - Accurate '93 player stats for all 28 teams in the majors - Full 162 game season mode - 4-player mode with EA Sports 4 Way Play - Real Baseball-Snap throws, run-downs, the double switch, cutoff men, even bad hops and booted balls!
